title: Lebron & LaMelo Injuries, Trade Deadline, Nets-Jazz | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Lebron & LaMelo Injuries, Trade Deadline, Nets-Jazz | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
New WHAT'S BURNIN' is here. Matt and Stak breakdown the unfortunate injury news for both Lebron James and rookie of the year front-runner LaMelo Ball. Plus, they preview the trade deadline and some big matchups coming up this week between the Heat & Suns and Nets & Jazz.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
